title: Firearms Expert Reacts To BattleBit Remastered’s Guns
description: Jonathan Ferguson, a weapons expert and Keeper of Firearms & Artillery at the Royal Armouries, breaks down more of the weaponry of BattleBit Remastered, including the British firearms, the L96 and L86A1, the AK74, and Jonathan’s favorite, the MP5.

title: Mortal Kombat 1 Tower Gameplay | Online Stress Test
description: Check out some Mortal Kombat 1 Tower gameplay from the Online Stress Test weekend. We play as Kenshi with Sonya Blade as our assist character.
